query.myquery: select MEMBER.memberEmail, MEMBER.memberNick, MEMBER.memberName, MEMBER.memberBirth, MEMBER.memberHobby, MEMBER.memberAdd, MEMBER.memberJob, MEMBER.memberHeight, PROFIL.profilThumbnail from PROFIL inner join MEMBER where MEMBER.memberNo = PROFIL.memberNo and PROFIL.memberNo = ?

SELECT MEMBER.memberName, MEMBER.memberNick, MEMBER.memberBirth, MEMBER.memberHobby, MEMBER.memberAdd, MEMBER.memberHeight, MEMBER.memberJob, MEMBER.memberSNSYn, MEMBER.memberEmailYn FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.memberNo = ?
select profilThumbnail FROM PROFIL WHERE memberNo=? order by profilMainYn desc
INSERT INTO PROFIL(memberNo, profilOriginalFileName, profilSaveFileName, profilThumbnail) VALUES(?, ?, ? , ?, 0)
INSERT INTO PROFIL(memberNo, profilOriginalFileName, profilSaveFileName, profilThumbnail, profilMainYn) VALUES(?, ?, ? , ?, 1)
